title: Linux Kernel 6.15 Boosts Virtualization, GPU, and CPU Performance
author: Damon M Garn
description: Sysadmins managing Linux servers with large quantities of RAM, lots of virtual machines, or are concerned about Spectre v2 vulnerabilities will be particularly happy with this release.
cntitle: Linux Kernel 6.15 提升虚拟化、GPU 和 CPU 性能
cndescription: 管理具有大量 RAM、大量虚拟机或担心 Spectre v2 漏洞的 Linux 服务器的系统管理员会对这个版本特别满意。
